Bi'r Tawīl is the only land outside Antarctica that is not inside a nation. It lies between Egypt and Sudan in a trapezoid shape. It is a Terra Nullis and is completely uninhabited.
There are no roads but there are tyre tracks.
There are several mountains and wadis in this area.
Food should be brought in, as there is nothing to buy in Bi'r Tawīl.
Likewise, make sure to bring plenty of water, as this is a desert.
As there are no cities, a tent will be useful for sleeping in.
The countries that surround this place are Egypt and Sudan.
